name: Chapter 1
description: When the newly elected President reneges on a promise, Francis and Claire decide to sever all allegiances and toss the rules out the window.

name: Chapter 2
description: Francis and Doug plan to frame Secretary of State nominee, Michael Kern. Meanwhile, Zoe's popularity at the Washington Herald continues to grow.

name: Chapter 3
description: Francis heads for his hometown to deal with a crisis. Zoe negotiates the politics of being a journalist on the rise. Claire finds herself a new business partner.

name: Chapter 4
description: Francis shakes down the Congressional leadership. Zoe is offered the promotion of White House Correspondent and doesn't know if she should take it or not.

name: Chapter 5
description: A feud starts between Francis and Marty Spinella. Russo goes into depression about the job losses at the shipyards.

name: Chapter 6
description: The strike between Frank and Marty starts to get out of hand. Russo has decided to run for Governor of Pennsylvania.

name: Chapter 7
description: Frank helps Peter get ready for his governor race, but Peter is starting to have second thoughts. Doug tries to help a young hooker in trouble.

name: Chapter 8
description: Frank has a library named after him at his old military school. Peter tries to win back the support of his hometown.

name: Chapter 9
description: Frank tries to do whatever it takes to get the new bill passed congress. Russo goes on a bus campaign with the Vice President, but the VP is not making it an easy trip for him. Zoe's relationship with Frank gets a little bumpy.

name: Chapter 10
description: Claire fuels an old flame. Peter wrestles with his demons. Francis crosses the point of no return.

name: Chapter 11
description: Zoe extends her time away from The Hill while Francis tracks down Russo and engages in damage control.

name: Chapter 12
description: The President sends Frank to St. Louis to persuade Raymond Tusk into becoming the new Vice President. Zoe and Janine investigate Peter Russo's death.

name: Chapter 13
description: Frank scrambles to keep his plan on track. Gillian is planning to sue Claire. Zoe, Janine, and Lucas investigate Rachel Posner and her relationship with Peter Russo.

name: Chapter 14
description: The Underwoods tackle two threats that could bring their plans to ruin. Francis grooms his replacement as Whip. Claire goes on the offensive.

name: Chapter 15
description: Francis puts China in the cross-hairs. Claire confronts a painful trauma from her past. Lucas Goodwin presses for the truth.

name: Chapter 16
description: Tension rises between Francis and Raymond Tusk as the situation with China deteriorates. A battle in the Senate pits Francis against the Republicans.

name: Chapter 17
description: Francis takes on leaders in Congress; Peter Russo is forced to choose between politics and family.

name: Chapter 18
description: Francis' fight over an education bill creates unfortunate side effects.

name: Chapter 19
description: Francis' fight over an education bill creates unfortunate side effects.

name: Chapter 20
description: Francis wins a major victory; Peter faces his past; and Stamper attempts to bury a secret.

name: Chapter 21
description: As well as having to deal with Tusk, Francis confronts Linda Vasquez.  Meanwhile, Claire becomes a key influence on Tricia Walker.

name: Chapter 22
description: Francis and Stamper seek support in Congress.

name: Chapter 23
description: Having to deal with a military crisis abroad and issues at home, Francis decides to remove the Tusk problem permanently.  Meanwhile, Jackie Sharp and Claire have a run-in.

name: Chapter 24
description: Peter battles personal demons; Francis enters dangerous territory.

name: Chapter 25
description: Francis discovers that he has been shut out and Claire finds that she must sacrifice something dear to her.  Meanwhile, Stamper attempts to get back on top of things.

name: Chapter 26
description: Francis desperately tries to keep his plan on track in the Season 1 finale. Later, Claire suffers the consequences of her decisions.

name: Chapter 27
description: A rocky start for the Underwood Presidency. Frank wants to introduce an ambitious jobs program, while Claire sets her sights on the United Nations.

name: Chapter 28
description: Claire's U.N. bid runs into trouble. Frank fights off mutiny with a bold address to the country.

name: Chapter 29
description: The Russian president's state visit becomes a cold war of wills, and some punks heat things up.

name: Chapter 30
description: Claire bypasses Russia at the U.N. Frank tries to outmaneuver a potential challenger and ends up face to face with a higher power.

name: Chapter 31
description: Frank declares war on Congress to jump-start his jobs program. Claire spars with the Russian Ambassador.

name: Chapter 32
description: Frank and Claire travel to Moscow to negotiate the return of an imprisoned U.S. citizen. Claire takes a stand that jeopardizes their plans.

name: Chapter 33
description: The damage is done and the Underwoods must repair it. But deep wounds don't heal fast, and sometimes not at all.

name: Chapter 34
description: A hurricane endangers more than just the entire East Coast and Frank must make a difficult choice.

name: Chapter 35
description: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets distrubing intel and counsels him.

name: Chapter 36
description: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one while Claire tries to preserve the peace-keeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.

name: Chapter 37
description: Things turn ugly when Frank, Jackie, and Heather square off during their first debate. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

name: Chapter 38
description: Heather Dunbar goes for the jugular, forcing Claire to confront her worst fears. The rift between Frank and Claire widens.

name: Chapter 39
description: In the midst of the Iowa caucuses, Frank and Claire must confront hard truths about each other.
